import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { Collapse, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, DropdownToggle, Nav, Navbar, NavbarBrand, NavbarText, NavbarToggler, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown } from 'reactstrap'; import { Context as AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext' export const MainNav = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const { state: { username, isAuthenticated, errorMessage }, signOut, signIn } = useContext(AuthContext) console.log(errorMessage); const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return (
Volvo
Components GitHub Options Option 1 Option 2 Reset
{ isAuthenticated ? {username} Sign out : Sign in }
); };
